programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: After being captured by Ethan's troop, Pascal refuses to cooperate with Marcial and instead threatens to hurt the latter's family. Armando, on the other hand, blames Franco for the failure of their operation. Meanwhile, Corazon resolves to cut ties with Tiago after having a misunderstanding with Amelia.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Rhian tries to apologize to Isabelle, but the latter refuses to talk to her. Later, Rhian gets the surprise of her life after learning about Ivan's mission. Meanwhile, Ethan receives his promotion following his successful capture of David Pascal.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Daniela and Carlos learn that Marga is at risk of being dismissed from Maxwell because of bullying accusations. They also learn that Marga's actions stem from her problems at home. Daniela and Carlos then agree to make an effort in hopes of helping Marga change her behavior. Meanwhile, Romina agrees to a deal with the mysterious caller holding the evidence she needs. However, Romina receives a stern warning ahead of their negotiation.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Making a promise to her parents, Marga tries to change for the better. However, Marga's friends decide to pull a prank on Cassie, risking her dismissal from Maxwell. Daniela finds out that Romina is getting close to securing the evidence she needs to reopen her rape case. Daniela then tries to find a way to cover up her crime. Meanwhile, Myrna's lies about her illness are catching up on her.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Aryann and Tristan help to clear Waldo's name after Gomez drags his name into a scandal. Jenna forms another devious plot as she digs deeper into Waldo and Aryann's past.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: A heated confrontation erupts after Tristan learns about Waldo and Aryann's past. With Aryann's life crumbling before her, Jenna is a step closer to taking back her family.

programme.title: Ikaw At Ako At Ang Ending
programme.desc: When a bagman meets a hotelkeeper, he knows she's the one. To hide and start anew, they go to the northernmost part of the country where an unexpected end awaits them.

programme.title: Hanggang Saan
programme.desc: Jacob finally discovers the identity of the woman he is searching for. Suspicious of Sonya's real intentions for befriending his family, Jacob resorts to eliminate her to cut the loose ends on Edward's case. Meanwhile, Gabriel deduces that he is in grave danger.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Through the years, Robert has developed a great working relationship with his secretary, Romina. This does not sit well with Robert’s daughter, Daniela, who doubts the assistant’s true intentions. Things take a turn for the worse when Daniela discovers that her old flame is Romina’s current boyfriend.

programme.title: More Than Blue
programme.desc: K and Cream believe they're soulmates. When K finds out that he's dying, he thinks setting her free would be best for her.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Valerie is haunted by her past when she learns that Basti's friends are coincidentally named Iris and Ali. Meanwhile, Basti admits he still loves Iris as he defends himself against her malicious accusations.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Guilt consumes Iris as she realizes how much she has hurt Basti. Basti, on the other hand, decides it's best to get out of Iris and Ali's lives once and for all.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Ethan is crestfallen when Rhian turns down his marriage proposal. Rhian later comes to the aid of Isabelle and Elai after a group of men tried to harass them. But instead of expressing her gratitude, Isabelle continues to give the former the cold shoulder. This compels Rhian to reveal her darkest secret to her friends.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Rhian finds herself torn between her conscience and duties as Tiago commands her to eliminate Pascal. Unknown to her, Tiago is just putting her loyalty to the test. Aware of the magnitude of her mission and the lies she has been keeping, she opts to end her relationship with Ethan.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Kulas finds out that Myrna has been using a fake illness to extort money from him. Despite Myrna's desperate appeals, Kulas throws her out without a moment's hesitation. Meanwhile, Romina is desperate to secure the evidence to reopen her rape case. However, Daniela and Alvin remain determined to stop her at all costs. Elsewhere, Carlos rewards Marga upon finding out about his daughter's good deed.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: After being driven out by her family, Myrna seeks refuge with Jessa. Much to her disappointment, Myrna learns that Jessa carried out her plan to extort money from Romina. Despite this, Myrna covers up for Jessa and surrenders herself to the police. Meanwhile, Romina becomes more determined to have her assaulter punished after confirming the evidence in her rape case. Elsewhere, Daniela worries that her crimes might soon be revealed.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Aryann and Waldo tie up loose ends as they decide to let go of their failed love. However, fate finds a way to bring them together again when Aryann's former client goes berserk.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Bent on keeping Aryann for himself, Tristan resorts to desperate measures to marry her. Armand, under Jenna's orders, works on eliminating Aryann and Waldo's family.

programme.title: More Than Blue
programme.desc: K and Cream believe they're soulmates. When K finds out that he's dying, he thinks setting her free would be best for her.

programme.title: The General's Daughter

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Cassandra forms an unlikely friendship with Val and Agnes when they find out they’re being cheated on by the same man. Then, Cassandra is deceived again by a man who leaves her pregnant with Iris. Iris grows up helping her mother until Cassandra meets and marries Oliver, whom she explains to Iris as the man guaranteed by certain signs. Years later, Iris experiences these signs with her best friend, Ali.

programme.desc: Kulas finds out that Myrna has been using a fake illness to extort money from him. Despite Myrna's desperate appeals, Kulas throws her out without a moment's hesitation.
